messages.title: A personal message for the General Election
messages.content: I got involved in local politics after campaigning to stop Borstal Recreation Ground from being lost to Medway Council. Since 2011 I have represented Rochester West on Medway council, where I know how great our area is but also the challenges and problems we face.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Ed Miliband, Vince Cable, Alex Salmond, Nicola Sturgeon
mentions.tacticalSituation: Coalition of chaos, Voting for UKIP will hand keys of No. 10 to Miliband, poll finds

issues.economy: The deficit down, Income tax down, More jobs, New businesses, A better future for you, your family and our country

leaflet.personalStatement: I got involved in local politics after campaigning to stop Borstal Recreation Ground from being lost to Medway Council. Since 2011 I have represented Rochester West on Medway council, where I know how great our area is but also the challenges and problems we face. As your MP, ensuring the protection of Rochester and Strood are perfect, growing, and giving everyone a voice in our future.

images.caption: Talking to constituents in a local supermarket with Prime Minister
